text: The true elite of the Savage Orcs. Wielding large bone clubs to crack some skullz.
Orcs are led by the biggest and brawniest of their kind.
Orcs are led by the biggest and brawniest of their kind.
Orc Boyz call every weapon a "choppa" even the long pointy-ones.
If a giant finds itself among a horde of savage orcs it will usually adopt their customs and be given their war paints.
Give a Black Orc two weapons, and watch the carnage they create double itself.
Even with primitive wooden shields and spears reinforced with bone, these savage brutes are "readi for 'scrappin".
Bound in huge bulging muscles, the Savage Orc Big Boss wades through battle hacking off heads and limbs.
Now den, some times what da boyz need is a lad what can take a beating, and beat back! Dey need a lad wif a serious pair of tusks! Dem need a Black Orc!
